review: I was led to believe it would work with my Sony Bravia, so I purchased it. After about 20 minutes of speaking with a tech rep, it was determined that the Fire TV Stick only works on the television in my basement. There is a chance Sony may have software updates available that I could download to make the 2 devices compatible, but I haven't taken the time to research this. So, the reason for the 3 stars (vs 5), isn't due to the product; it's due to the product not being compatible with my equipment, and I was led to believe that it would be compatible.
author: Amazon Customer
